availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Founded in Lexington, Kentucky, in 1856. Founding Director(s): John G. James (President), George W. Brand, John Norton, Oliver Farra, L. H. Chrisman, Dudley Portwood, Benjamin Tyler, James H. Hanna, Jesse Baker, Robert Young, Jordan Scott, Leslie Combs, William Simpson, Edwards Crosby, Silas P. Kenney, J. G. Kinnaird, A. Brand, Willa Viley and Sanders D. Bruce. Dissolved in 1865.

ab.bibl: "Agricultural Deposit Bank of Lexington (1856-1865)*, Lexington History Museum website, (http://lexhistory.org/wikilex/agricultural-deposit-bank-lexington-1856-1865) (accessed 4 Aug 2017).
